title: Elec,Optical&Magnet Prop
description: Introduction to quantum mechanics and the band theory of solids to describe semiconducting, superconducting, dielectric, optical, and magnetic properties of nano- and micro-structured materials.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MSE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
